ourservices.title: Our Services
ourservices.slogan1: We provide you with a recycling bin
ourservices.slogan3: We send them to recyclers, not the landfill
ourservices.notice: To ensure we can provide our service to your address,please whatsapp me on 93479770 to check before you subscribe to our service
ourservices.deposite: A $200 refundable deposit will be charged for the recycling bin

donation.title: Donation
donation.info: Your donation will help us make recycling in Hong Kong more available, affordable and sustainable. If you share our vision and belief,we welcome your donations.
